subject: improve packaging
commitMessage:
improve packaging

- remove debian/
- reset manifest
- call /sbin/ldconfig
- cleanup dependencies
- install license using %license
- fixed rpm group
- do not install sysvinit scripts

Change-Id: I0ec30fa08a2fcc580f4d7de11239fa43ce5ae75a
Signed-off-by: Anas Nashif <anas.nashif@intel.com>

ok I squashed both commits , this is unclear to me is there a doc that explicitly tell if changes files should not threaded separately or not ? I assume you take it along a single change and tear it apart in case of several ...


I referred to :
https://source.tizen.org/documentation/articles/submitting-and-reviewing-patches#2.1 Submitting Patches to the OBS


Feedback welcome at :
https://wiki.tizen.org/wiki/Talk:Packaging/Guidelines

subject: Add alarm-service dbus config
commitMessage:
Add alarm-service dbus config

Without a dbus system config file, the alarm service is not allowed
to own the org.tizen.alarm.manager name on the system bus

Change-Id: Ic59829e064907f729bad8c61efcc42a5ae35c316
